q_ch: 所有订单中总共做的前三多的商品是什么？
q_en: What are the top three products made in all orders in total?
gt:
Hey there! 😄 Based on the data I have, here are the top three products made in all orders:

| Product ID | Description | Attributes     | Total Quantity |
|------------|-------------|----------------|----------------|
| 7          | Skirt       | Purple, M size | 540            |
| 15         | Skirt       | Pink, M size   | 345            |
| 27         | T-shirt     | Yellow, S size | 260            |

These are the most popular items, and it looks like skirts are quite the trend! 🛍️ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT op.product_id, SUM(op.number) as total_quantity FROM order_product op GROUP BY op.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of each product made in all orders

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (7, 15, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the product details for the top three products
